medium: Black chalk and red chalk on brown laid paper, mounted down
creditline: Gift of Miss Margaret Mower for the Elsa Durand Mower Collection
inscribed:
Inscribed recto on mount, lower center edge, in brown ink:
Fedco Succaro; inscribed verso, upper center, in brown ink,
scratched out: No 33
